snippet: It has long been an open secret that the United States deployed nuclear bombs on Dutch soil. But reported confirmation on Monday came at a time when the Obama administration is accused of a policy U-turn by upgrading Cold War-era nuclear weapons.
abstract: It has long been an open secret that the United States deployed nuclear bombs on Dutch soil. But reported confirmation on Monday came at a time when the Obama administration is accused of a policy U-turn by upgrading Cold War-era nuclear weapons.

headline.main: Former Dutch Leader Steps Into U.S. Nukes Debate
